sentences.en: Give the stick a good rubdown with sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 用砂纸把这根棍棒好好磨光.

sentences.en: He found a towel and gave his body a vigorous rubdown.
sentences.cn: 他找到一条毛巾，并使劲地擦拭了他的身体。

sentences.en: I enjoyed getting a rubdown from my chiropractor.
sentences.cn: 我享受了(一番)我的按摩师给我的用力按摩.

sentences.en: Usage: after clean the face, apply some on the face and rubdown equably.
sentences.cn: 使用方法: 洁面后, 取本品适量均匀搽于面部.

words.tran_cn: 橡胶；橡皮；合成橡胶；按摩师
扭转脖子看；好奇地引颈而望

trans.tran_en: if you give someone a rubdown, you rub their body to make them relaxed, especially after exercise
